attributes.action: recognise Parental Alienation Syndrome (PAS) as emotional and psychological child abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day children are being alienated (brain washed) against the 'non-resident parent', usually the father, by the 'resident parent', usually the mother, and as a result a child suffers from Parental Alienation Syndrome (PAS).

The effect of a PAS sufferer is that child not wanting anything to do with the parent they have been alienated against.

PAS is emotional and psychological child abuse and should be treated with the same seriousness as all the other forms of child abuse.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recognise Parental Alienation Syndrome (PAS) as emotional and psychological child abuse."
